description: Schemas in #/definitions detect or validate keys/objects used in describing Specific Resources (Section 4).
title: Definitions: Specific Resources.

$eref.description: True when object tested has no selector, or has selector identified by uri, or has selector(s) with value matching one or more of the selectors described in the model (Section 4.2)
$eref.title: Definition: selector

_88selectorDetected.description: True when object tested has selector(s) that is(are) recognized as being one or more of the selectors described in the model (Section 4.2)
_88selectorDetected.title: Detection: selector type

_88sourceWithVia.description: True if no source, or source is uri, or source is object that does not have via key, or if source is object that has via key with all values of uri format

$eref.description: True when the annotation, body or target has 0 or more via properties that are strings of format uri (Section 3.3.7)
$eref.title: Validation: via value

_88itemSpecificResourceDetected.description: True when object has items array containing an object with exactly 1 source value and at least one of purpose, selector, state, styleClass, renderedVia, scope (Section 4)
_88itemSpecificResourceDetected.title: Detection: Specific Resource as item member of a Choice or Set

$eref.description: True when object has exactly 1 source value and at least one of purpose, selector, state, styleClass, renderedVia, scope (Section 4)
$eref.title: Detection: Specific Resource

$eref.description: True when object is a fragment selelctor (Section 4.2.1)
$eref.title: Detection: fragment selector

_88conformsToPropertyFound.description: True when object is a fragment selelctor with a conformsTo key (Section 4.2.1)
_88conformsToPropertyFound.title: Detection: fragment selector with conformsTo key

_88requestHeaderStateDetected.description: True when object is a request header state (Section 4.3.2)
_88requestHeaderStateDetected.title: Detection: request header state

_88xpathSelectorDetected.description: True when object is a XPath selelctor (Section 4.2.3)
_88xpathSelectorDetected.title: Detection: XPath selector

$eref.description: True when object is a range selelctor (Section 4.2.9)
$eref.title: Detection: range selector

_88rangeSelectorTypeValidIfPresent.description: True if Selector Type not detected (i.e., not present), or if both Type and Selector detected (i.e., Selector constraints met); note, Selector cannot be detected if Selector Type not detected.

$eref.description: True when object has exactly 1 source key value and that value is of format uri or an External Web Resource (Section 4) - NB, the Specific Resource is closer in hierarchy to the External Web Resource than a Choice or Set; the items of a Choice or Set may be Specific Resources, but the source of a Specific Resource may not be a Choice or Set.
$eref.title: Detection: source

_88specificeResourceDetected.description: True when object has exactly 1 source value and at least one of purpose, selector, state, styleClass, renderedVia, scope (Section 4)

$eref.description: True when the body has 0 or more purpose property values (Section 3.3.5)
$eref.title: Validation: purpose value

$eref.description: True when object tested has selector(s) that is(are) recognized as being one or more of the selectors described in the model (Section 4.2)
$eref.title: Detection: selector type

$eref.description: True when object tested has state(s) that is(are) recognized as being one or more of the states described in the model (Section 4.3)
$eref.title: Detection: state type

$eref.description: Supports implementation check of styleClass (if/when) used on Specific Resources (Sections 4.4)
$eref.title: Collate: styleClass key with qualifying body/target classes

$eref.description: Supports implementation check of renderedVia (if/when) used on Specific Resources (Sections 4.4)
$eref.title: Collate: renderedVia key with qualifying body/target classes

$eref.description: Supports implementation check of scope (if/when) used on Specific Resource Body (Sections 4.6)
$eref.title: Collate: scope key with qualifying body/target classes

_88specificeResourceDetected.title: Detection: Specific Resource

_88dataPositionSelectorDetected.description: True when object is a data position selelctor (Section 4.2.5)
_88dataPositionSelectorDetected.title: Definition: data position selector

_88itemStateValidIfPresent.description: True if ALL items in the items array of object tested have no state, or have a state that is uri, or have a state that has recognized value(s)

$eref.description: True when object tested has state with value matching one or more of the state classes described in the model (Section 4.3)
$eref.title: Definition: state

_88timeStateDetected.description: True when object is a time state (Section 4.3.1)
_88timeStateDetected.title: Detection: time state

_88sourceWithCanonical.description: True if no source, or source is uri, or source is object that does not have canonical key, or if source is object that has only 1 canonical key of uri format

$eref.description: True when the annotation, body or target has 0 or 1 canonical properties that are strings of format uri (Section 3.3.7)
$eref.title: Validation: canonical value

_88textQuoteSelectorDetected.description: True when object is a text quote selelctor (Section 4.2.4)
_88textQuoteSelectorDetected.title: Detection: text quote selector

$eref.description: True when object is a fragment selelctor (Section 4.2.1)
$eref.title: Detection: fragment selector

_88fragmentSelectorTypeValidIfPresent.description: True if Selector Type not detected (i.e., not present), or if both Type and Selector detected (i.e., Selector constraints met); note, Selector cannot be detected if Selector Type not detected.

$eref.description: True when object has exactly 1 source key value and that value is of format uri or an External Web Resource (Section 4) - NB, the Specific Resource is closer in hierarchy to the External Web Resource than a Choice or Set; the items of a Choice or Set may be Specific Resources, but the source of a Specific Resource may not be a Choice or Set.
$eref.title: Detection: source

_88specificResourceWithItems.description: True if both source and items keys are present.

_88refinedByDetected.description: True when object tested has selector or state that has refinedBy(s) that is(are) recognized as being one or more of the refinedBys described in the model (Section 4.2)
_88refinedByDetected.title: Detection: refinedBy

_88sourceWithCreated.description: True if no source, or source is uri, or source is object that does not have created key, or if source is object that has only 1 created key of date-time format

$eref.description: True when the object being tested (annotation, body, target...) has no created or has a single created of format date-time (Section 3.3.1)
$eref.title: Validation: created value

_88itemStyleClassPropertyDetected.description: Supports implementation check of items having styleClass (if/when) used on Specific Resources (Sections 4.4)
_88itemStyleClassPropertyDetected.title: Collate: items having styleClass key with qualifying body/target classes

$eref.description: Supports implementation check of styleClass (if/when) used on Specific Resources (Sections 4.4)
$eref.title: Collate: styleClass key with qualifying body/target classes

$eref.description: True when object is a time state (Section 4.3.1)
$eref.title: Detection: time state

_88timeStateTypeValidIfPresent.description: True if State Type not detected (i.e., not present), or if both Type and State detected (i.e., State constraints met); note, State cannot be detected if State Type not detected.

_88sourceWithTextDirection.description: True if no source, or source is uri, or source is object that does not have textDirection key, or if source is object that has only 1 textDirectoin key, one of ltr, rtl, auto

$eref.description: True when the body or target has no textDirection or exactly one valid textDirection (Section 3.2.1)
$eref.title: Validation: textDirection

_88styleClassDefinition.description: True when the object has no styleClass property or has a styleClass property that appears with source and that is a string value or array of string values (Section 4.4)
_88styleClassDefinition.title: Definition: styleClass property value

$eref.description: True when the object has no styleClass property or has a styleClass property that appears with source and that is a string value or array of string values (Section 4.4)
$eref.title: Definition: styleClass property value

_88styleClassDetected.description: Supports implementation check of styleClass (if/when) used on Specific Resources (Sections 4.4)
_88styleClassDetected.title: Collate: styleClass key with qualifying body/target classes

_88sourceWithModified.description: True if no source, or source is uri, or source is object that does not have modified key, or if source is object that has only 1 modified key of date-time format

$eref.description: True when the annotation, body or target has no modified or has a single modified of format date-time (Section 3.3.1)
$eref.title: Validation: modified value

_88itemSelectorValidIfPresent.description: True if ALL items in the items array of object tested have no selector, or have a selector that is uri, or have a selector that has recognized value(s)

$eref.description: True when object tested has no selector, or has selector identified by uri, or has selector(s) with value matching one or more of the selectors described in the model (Section 4.2)
$eref.title: Definition: selector

_88itemRefinedByValidIfPresent.description: True if items in the items array of object tested have no refinedBy, or have a refinedBy that is uri, or have a refinedBy that has recognized value(s)

$eref.description: True if no state or selector, if no refinedBy, or if correct refinedBy
True when object is a text quote selelctor (Section 4.2.4)
$eref.title: Detection: text quote selector

_88prefixPropertyFound.description: True when object is a text quote selelctor with a prefix key (Section 4.2.4)
_88prefixPropertyFound.title: Detection: text quote selector with prefix key

_88svgSelectorDetected.description: True when object is a svg selelctor (Section 4.2.7)
_88svgSelectorDetected.title: Detection: svg selector

$eref.description: True when object is a text quote selelctor (Section 4.2.4)
$eref.title: Detection: text quote selector

_88suffixPropertyFound.description: True when object is a text quote selelctor with a suffix key (Section 4.2.4)
_88suffixPropertyFound.title: Detection: text quote selector with suffix key

$eref.description: True when object tested has state with value matching one or more of the state classes described in the model (Section 4.3)
$eref.title: Definition: state

_88stateDetected.description: True when object tested has state(s) that is(are) recognized as being one or more of the states described in the model (Section 4.3)
_88stateDetected.title: Detection: state type

_88selectorDefined.description: True when object tested has no selector, or has selector identified by uri, or has selector(s) with value matching one or more of the selectors described in the model (Section 4.2)
_88selectorDefined.title: Definition: selector

_88sourceDetected.description: True when object has exactly 1 source key value and that value is of format uri or an External Web Resource (Section 4) - NB, the Specific Resource is closer in hierarchy to the External Web Resource than a Choice or Set; the items of a Choice or Set may be Specific Resources, but the source of a Specific Resource may not be a Choice or Set.
